description: Provides a resource for an AS (Auto scaling) lifecycle hook.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DefaultResult.description: Defines the action the AS group should take when the lifecycle hook timeout elapses or if an unexpected failure occurs. Valid values: `CONTINUE` and `ABANDON`. The default value is `CONTINUE`.

HeartbeatTimeout.description: Defines the amount of time, in seconds, that can elapse before the lifecycle hook times out. Valid value ranges: (30~7200). and default value is `300`.

LifecycleHookName.description: The name of the lifecycle hook.

LifecycleTransition.description: The instance state to which you want to attach the lifecycle hook. Valid values: `INSTANCE_LAUNCHING` and `INSTANCE_TERMINATING`.

NotificationMetadata.description: Contains additional information that you want to include any time AS sends a message to the notification target.

NotificationQueueName.description: For CMQ_QUEUE type, a name of queue must be set.

NotificationTopicName.description: For CMQ_TOPIC type, a name of topic must be set.
